hero.name: Houdini
hero.specialAbility: When you take the maneuver action and BOOST, you may place Houdini in any space instead of moving. (Bess moves as normal.)

cards.title: Vanishing Act
cards.basicText: After combat: Choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 3 spaces. They may move through their opposing fighters.

cards.title: The Big Reveal
cards.basicText: After combat: Return one card you boosted with to your hand.
cards.duringText: You may BOOST this card twice.

cards.title: Smoke and Mirrors
cards.immediateText: Houdini and Bess may swap spaces. If they do, your other fighter is now in the combat.

cards.title: Sleight of Hand
cards.immediateText: You may return this card to your hand and choose a different card to play. Resolve all effects on that card as normal.

cards.title: Set the Stage
cards.boostTrick: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card for them to discard.
cards.basicText: Draw 3 cards. Then, put a card in your hand on top of your deck.

cards.title: Misdirection
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

cards.title: Grand Escape
cards.basicText: After combat: If you won the combat, place your fighter in any space.

cards.title: An Illusion of My Own Design
cards.immediateText: Your opponent may BOOST their card.

cards.title: All Part of the Show
cards.boostTrick: Houdini recovers 2 health. This card's effect cannot be canceled.
cards.basicText: After combat: If your fighter was defeated, set their health to 4 instead and place them in any space. (This effect happens even if Houdini was defeated.)

cards.title: A Magician Never Reveals His Secrets
cards.basicText: Draw 2 cards. Gain 1 action. If an effect would let an opponent look at your hand, you may reveal this card and cancel that effect.

cards.title: For My Next Trick
cards.basicText: After combat: Move one of your fighters up to 1 space. Draw 1 card. Gain 1 action.

cards.title: And the Beautiful Bess!
cards.boostTrick: If it's your turn, gain 1 action.
cards.basicText: If you discard this card as a result of an opponent's effect, draw 1 card.
